parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.98</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Unit Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns current vehicle move/turn info (a getter for [[sendSimpleCommand]]) in format [moveInfo, turnInfo]. Possible values:

{<template><title>!</title></template> class<template><title>=</title></template>"wikitable"
! moveInfo !! turnInfo
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> width<template><title>=</title></template>"50%" <template><title>!</title></template>
* <tt>"FORMATION"</tt> - vehicle is stationary
* <tt>"FORWARD"</tt>  - vehicle is moving forward
* <tt>"FAST"</tt> - vehicle is slow moving forward
* <tt>"SLOW"</tt> - vehicle is fast moving forward
* <tt>"STOP"</tt> - vehicle is stationary
* <tt>"BACK"</tt> - vehicle is reversing
* <template><title>sic</title><part><name index="1"/><value><tt>"DirectByComander"</tt></value></part></template> - keyboard pilot is used, i.e. player is in the vehicle and is the [[effectiveCommander]] pressing any driving key (WASD or arrows). 
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> style<template><title>=</title></template>"vertical-align: top" <template><title>!</title></template>
* <tt>"LEFT"</tt> - vehicle is turning left (use [[sendSimpleCommand | "STOPTURNING"]] to cancel)
* <tt>"RIGHT"</tt> - vehicle is turning right (use [[sendSimpleCommand | "STOPTURNING"]] to cancel)
* <tt>"NONE"</tt> - vehicle is not turning (when script command is used)
* <tt>"ABS"</tt> - vehicle is not turning (when keyboard pilot is used)
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>} </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[vehicleMoveInfo]] vehicle </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  vehicle: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] in format [moveInfo, turnInfo], where:
* moveInfo: [[String]] - state of vehicle forward/backward movement (see description)
* turnInfo: [[String]] - state of vehicle left/right turning (see description) </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[onEachFrame]] { [[hintSilent]] [[str]] [[vehicleMoveInfo]] [[vehicle]] [[player]] };</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[sendSimpleCommand]], [[useAISteeringComponent]], [[effectiveCommander]], [[setEffectiveCommander]], [[enableAI]], [[disableAI]], [[enableAIFeature]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
